akn:subsection.akn:heading: Change of voting address within a jurisdiction

akn:content.akn:p: (f) Change of voting address within a jurisdiction In the case of a change of address, for voting purposes, of a registrant to another address within the same registrar’s jurisdiction, the registrar shall correct the voting registration list accordingly, and the registrant’s name may not be removed from the official list of eligible voters by reason of such a change of address except as provided in subsection (d).
